summary: Sets up and launches the FastAPI application for the Agenta backend, configuring cross-origin resource sharing, attaching all domain routers, establishing database connectivity, and integrating Celery for asynchronous background processing via a managed application lifespan.
business_intent: Provide a scalable, secure API layer that serves the Agenta platformâ€™s frontend, handles data storage interactions, and offloads long-running operations to background workers.
